en.text: Rajkot Offers is a platform that connects local businesses with customers, offering exclusive deals and discounts. Users can discover the best offers in Rajkot, making shopping more affordable and enjoyable.

fr.title: Snappy

ko.title: Snappy
ko.text: Swift로 설계된 강력한 사진 앱으로, iOS 및 Android에서 고급 카메라 제어, 편집 도구, AI 기반 필터를 통해 빠르게 사진을 보정할 수 있습니다.

en.title: Dibbs-Marketplace

en.title: Algocraze
en.text: The software is designed for algorithmic trading and features three user panels: admin, agent, and client. It includes a stock subscription system and applies various algorithms to help clients analyze market trends and validate trading opportunities. Based on these analyses, detailed reports are generated to assist in informed decision-making.
